articles.title: New CVS App Allows Customers to Unlock Cabinets to Access Products
articles.summary: CVS is launching a new feature within its CVS Health app that allows loyalty members to unlock previously secured product cabinets themselves. This new feature, which started as a pilot program in New York City, is planned to roll out to approximately 10 stores on the West Coast and aims to improve customer convenience by eliminating the need to wait for assistance from store clerks.

articles.title: Nécessaire's Deodorant Kept Me Smelling Fresh for 3 Days of Fashion Week
articles.author: Halie Le Savage
articles.summary: Nécessaire launched a new deodorant available at Sephora, Amazon, and its online boutique for $22. The deodorant features gentle mandelic acid and odor-controlling vitamins B3 and B5, promising 72-hour odor control. It is available in Eucalyptus-scented, fragrance-free, sandalwood oil and signature scents.

articles.title: Amazon Ads makes Brand+ widely available
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Amazon Ads has launched Brand+ in the Amazon DSP, an AI-driven optimization capability, now available to all advertisers. Brand+ combines shopping, browsing, and streaming signals to target potential customers for a brand's product or service, allowing marketers to deliver video ads across platforms like Prime Video and Twitch.  During beta testing, some advertisers experienced over a 10% increase in sales and over 70% increase in website traffic.

articles.title: Before you continue to YouTube
articles.summary: YouTube personalizes content and ads based on user activity, including video recommendations, a customized homepage, and tailored ads. This personalization leverages past activity, such as watched videos and searches. YouTube also uses cookies and data to tailor the experience in an age-appropriate manner.

articles.title: Kellanova, Golden West Food Group launch ice cream collaboration
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Eggo and Rice Krispies Treats are launching reimagined flavors. These new products represent variations of existing popular food brands.

articles.title: Score the iRobot Roomba Combo i5 Robot Vacuum & Mop at its lowest price ever today on Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: iRobot is launching the Roomba Combo i5 Robot Vacuum & Mop. This robot combines powerful suction with efficient mopping capabilities. The product is available at its lowest price ever today on Amazon.

articles.title: Walk through Fort Collins' new Midtown King Soopers Marketplace
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: King Soopers has introduced a new King Soopers Marketplace at 2535 S. College Ave. in Midtown Fort Collins. The new marketplace offers a virtual shopping experience.

articles.title: Take a look inside Fort Collins' sprawling new Midtown King Soopers
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: King Soopers opened a new Marketplace store in Fort Collins on January 29, 2025. The store features expanded produce, cheese, and deli sections, as well as wine and beer selections. It also includes apparel, kitchen gadgets, dinnerware, electronics, a drive-up pharmacy, and both manned and self-checkout stands.

articles.title: Snag this 'luxury hotel'-like queen sheet set while it's $16 (an all-time low)
articles.summary: Utopia Bedding is offering its affordable Sheet Set on Amazon. The queen-size 4-piece set is currently marked down to $15. The brushed microfiber poly-blend sheets are soft, resistant to shrinking and fading, and include a fitted sheet, a flat sheet, and two pillowcases.

articles.title: Sell-out blanket hoodie brand behind 'cosy' viral buy sends shoppers wild over its new collection
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Oodie has launched new additions to its popular Pokémon Collection, featuring Jigglypuff, Squirtle, and Ditto. The new collection includes Oodies, sleep tees, and blankets and are officially-licensed. These are designed to provide comfort and warmth, made with ultra-soft sherpa fleece and Toastytek™ flannel fleece.

articles.title: The £3.50 ‘genius' laundry buy that means you'll NEVER drop a sock again OR have to bend over hanging up clothes
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: A woman on TikTok is raving about a new product called a 'laundry bib' which is available on Amazon for £3.45. The bib allows users to load wet washing into a pocket, freeing their hands while carrying laundry and making hanging clothes easier. Users have expressed interest and excitement about this laundry gadget.

articles.title: Coca-Cola unveils new orange cream flavor, bringing nostalgia to shelves
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, which blends the classic Coke taste with creamy orange. This limited-time offering will be available through the first quarter of 2026, aiming to reconnect consumers with a beloved flavor tradition while innovating the Coca-Cola experience. The launch highlights Coca-Cola's commitment to innovation and reimagining classic flavors, following recent releases like Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Oreo and Coca-Cola Y3000.

articles.title: With its flagship Magic 7 Pro, Honor flirts with Android greatness
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic 7 Pro smartphone, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, IP69 water resistance, and a 6.8-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. As of January 15, the device is available globally (excluding the US and Canada), with a base configuration of 12GB RAM and 512GB storage, priced at £1100 / €1,300.

articles.title: ChatGPT isn't available in China, so should the US ban DeepSeek?
articles.summary: DeepSeek AI launched DeepSeek R1, an AI model positioned as a competitor to ChatGPT. This release showcases Chinese innovation in the AI field. The model's capabilities and cost-effectiveness are being closely watched, as is the potential for its use and impact on the global AI market.

articles.title: CVS rolls out app that allows customers to unlock anti-theft shelves: ‘People really, really dislike locked cabinets'
articles.author: Brooke Kato
articles.summary: CVS Health has launched a new feature in its revamped CVS Health app allowing customers to unlock theft-proof cabinets in select New York City locations. This feature aims to improve the customer experience by reducing wait times associated with locked cabinets. In addition to unlocking cabinets, the app allows shoppers to manage prescriptions, schedule appointments, and access benefit information.

articles.title: BOXABL Launches $19,999 Baby Box: A Turnkey Home on Wheels
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BOXABL has launched the Baby Box, a portable living space priced at $19,999. Pre-orders are now open, with deliveries expected in late 2025. The Baby Box is designed to be a turnkey home, offering affordability, flexibility, and functionality for various needs like disaster relief or extra personal space.

articles.title: Dyson launched a new Airwrap, Airstrait, and Supersonic Nural hair dryer, and they're Valentine's Day gold
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Dyson launched Red Velvet and Gold editions of its Airwrap, Airstrait, and Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer. The Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer in Red Velvet and Gold is exclusively available at Dyson.com for $500. Each hair tool comes with complimentary gifts including a presentation case and two Dyson styling clips, valued at $100.

articles.title: Jack Dorsey's Block unveils open-source AI agent
articles.author: Quartz Intelligence Newsroom
articles.summary: Block, founded by Jack Dorsey, has officially launched Goose, its open-source AI agent. Goose aims to enhance efficiency for users across various sectors by simplifying everyday duties and complex software development. Block anticipates that Goose will democratize access to AI technology, streamlining workflows for a broader range of users.

articles.title: AI mirror lets you try on new clothes from the subway or bus stop by scanning your skeleton to make outfit feel real
articles.author: Steve Brenner
articles.summary: Indestry launched the Vyu Try-on Mirror in Summer 2024, an augmented reality mirror that allows users to virtually try on clothes. The company aims to expand this technology for in-store and at-home use starting in 2025, envisioning it as a 'Peloton of home clothing trials.' This technology tracks the user's skeleton and renders 3D clothing to simulate real-time visualization of different styles and colors.

articles.title: App allows Cape Breton grocery store customers to buy discounted food
articles.author: Christopher Connors
articles.summary: Flashfood app alerts users to discounted food at Atlantic Superstore and No Frills locations. Customers can purchase items through the app and pick them up at the Flashfood Zone, saving up to 50% on everyday essentials. Launched at Loblaw in 2019, Flashfood is available in 850 Loblaw grocery stores and franchise locations across Canada.

articles.title: Social media's favourite hand sanitizer has launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Touchland, a beauty and lifestyle brand, recently launched its hand sanitizers in Canada, in response to consumer demand. Select scents, including Wild Watermelon, Berry Bliss and Gentle Mist Lily of the Valley, were introduced at Sephora, with additional scents like Glow Mist Rosewater, Blue Sandalwood, Beach Coco, Pure Lavender, and Rainwater scheduled for release starting February 11.

articles.title: Social media's favourite hand sanitizer has launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Touchland has launched its hand sanitizers in Canada, with select scents like Wild Watermelon, Berry Bliss, and Gentle Mist Lily of the Valley now available at Sephora Canada. Additional scents such as Glow Mist Rosewater, Blue Sandalwood, Beach Coco, Pure Lavender, and Rainwater will be available starting February 11. The Touchland Power Mists Hydrating hand sanitizer retails for $14, while the Gentle Mist Ultra-soothing hand sanitizer retails for $22.

articles.title: Social media's favourite hand sanitizer has launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Touchland, a beauty and lifestyle brand, has launched its hand sanitizers in Canada.  This launch caters to the demand of Canadian consumers who have shown interest in the brand's sensorial experience and approach to personal care. The product's introduction to the Canadian market represents a strategic expansion driven by customer demand and alignment with the brand's mission.

articles.title: Social media's favourite hand sanitizer has launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Touchland, a beauty and lifestyle brand, has recently launched its hand sanitizers in Canada. The brand is known for its non-sticky sanitizers with noteworthy scents and skincare-forward formulations that hydrate and nourish the skin.

articles.title: Social media's favourite hand sanitizer has launched in Canada
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Touchland has launched its hand sanitizers in Canada, with select scents available at Sephora Canada. The Touchland Power Mists Hydrating hand sanitizer retails for $14, and the Gentle Mist Ultra-soothing hand sanitizer retails for $22. Additional scents will be available starting February 11.

articles.title: 2024 Lexus GX 550 review: A fresh new life
articles.author: Amos Kwon
articles.summary: Lexus has launched the redesigned 2024 GX 550, a luxury off-roader featuring a 3.4-liter twin-turbocharged V6 engine producing 349 horsepower and 379 lb-ft of torque. The new GX includes updated steering, full-time four-wheel drive, and increased towing capacity, along with a completely redesigned interior featuring a 14-inch touchscreen and improved materials.

articles.title: Discontinued Sodas We Don't Miss
articles.author: Brian Boone
articles.summary: PepsiCo introduced Pepsi A.M. in 1989 as a caffeinated alternative to coffee, while Coca-Cola launched New Coke in 1985 with a reformulated recipe.  Coca-Cola also released OK Soda in the 1990s, targeting Generation X with a self-deprecating marketing campaign, and later introduced Coca-Cola Blak, a coffee-flavored soda, in 2006. These products ultimately failed to gain sustained popularity.

articles.title: From today VI Conference For the Balance of the World
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: Tesla announced the Model 3 Performance Upgrade Package, which enhances the car's acceleration to 2.9 seconds 0-60 mph. The upgrade includes new tires, enhanced brakes, and a recalibrated motor controller, and is available for purchase and installation at Tesla service centers.

articles.title: Acumatica Shares Upcoming Innovations, Unveils AI-First Product Strategy During Day 2 of Summit 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Acumatica announced its AI-first product strategy along with other upcoming innovations during its Summit Day 2 Keynote. These updates aim to address business challenges and enable mid-sized businesses to scale using modern technologies.

articles.title: How Mickey Drexler Cares for His Cashmere Socks
articles.author: Emilia Petrarca
articles.summary: Cuyana is launching its new spring collection, including the 'oversized Celestia' bag, at an event in its Nolita store, offering guests an exclusive pre-launch shopping experience. Alex Mill is selling cozy cashmere socks.

articles.title: Sparkling Ice® Launches Two New STARBURST® Candy Flavors as Part of First-Ever ‘RED PACK'
articles.author: Talking Rain Beverage Company
articles.summary: Talking Rain Beverage Co. launched new STARBURST FaveReds flavored Sparkling Ice drinks. These new flavors capture the creamy taste of STARBURST FaveReds candy in Sparkling Ice's signature bottle. The Sparkling Ice STARBURST collaboration has seen high demand since its initial limited-time offering.

articles.title: This high-performance Ryzen 9 mini PC is on sale for just $399
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Acemagic is offering its AM08 Pro mini PC, featuring an AMD Ryzen 9 6900HX CPU, 32GB DDR5 RAM, and a 512GB SSD, for $399 on Amazon.  The mini PC supports triple 4K60 monitors and offers multiple connectivity options like USB-A 3.0, Gigabit Ethernet, and HDMI 2.0 ports making it suitable for both productivity and moderate gaming with integrated AMD Radeon 680M graphics.

articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Gov
articles.author: Scott Nover
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a government version of ChatGPT. This launch aims to advance OpenAI's business strategy and boost efficiency and productivity for the US government by leveraging AI technology.

articles.title: Jetify launches Testpilot, its AI QA engineer
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Jetify is launching its first AI agent product, Testpilot. This agent automates the routine test creation process by creating a test plan, executing it, and reporting back.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Products That'll Feel Like You Abracadabra'd Your Way To A New Bathroom
articles.author: Cara Marquez
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a range of new products for bathroom upgrades and organization. These include items such as towel warmers, shower curtains, storage shelves, a smart toilet, and modern bathtubs with massage jets. These new introductions aim to enhance the bathroom experience with both functional and aesthetic improvements.

articles.title: A Lip Balm to Get You Through a Snowstorm
articles.author: Crystal Martin
articles.summary: Jordan Samuel Skin launched 'The Lip Balm,' a thick, occlusive, yet balanced lip balm. According to the author's experience, it effectively softens flaky lips and provides long-lasting protection against dry winter air. The balm also serves as a hydrating base for lip glosses and lipsticks.

articles.title: Jazwares Is Building Something New With BLDR, a New Ingenuitive Toy Construction Brand
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Jazwares launched BLDR, a new construction toy brand, this month. BLDR features world-famous brands, immersive playsets, and buildable action figures. The toy offers a system for kids and collectors to creatively build and play.

articles.title: Block launches open-source AI agent Goose as Jack Dorsey praises DeepSeek's development approach
articles.author: Leo Schwartz
articles.summary: Block has launched Goose, an open-source AI agent designed to allow developers to customize AI tools using different large language models. Goose can connect with models like OpenAI's o1 or DeepSeek's R1 for tasks such as checking code, sending emails, and organizing calendars. Unlike other AI agents, Goose can interact with different LLMs and expand beyond its original purpose.

articles.title: The Battery Welcomes Walk-On's Sports Bistreaux This Summer
articles.author: Marietta Daily Journal
articles.summary: Walk-On's Sports Bistreaux will debut its new offering at The Battery Atlanta this summer.

articles.title: 'AI Aapko Nahi Bataya Ki Dusra AI…' and other viral memes as DeepSeek 'shocks' ChatGPT
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: DeepSeek launched its R1 model, gaining significant attention for its advanced AI capabilities and remarkably low operating costs. The launch has sparked discussions about the potential of AI in various fields and raised ethical concerns. The model is also generating memes and drawing comparisons with competitors such as ChatGPT.

articles.title: Bath and Body Works Signature Scent Lab is now available to shop online
articles.author: Angela Tricarico
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works launched the Signature Scent Lab, a new product line of single-note fragrance mists designed for layering. The collection of 13 travel-size fragrance mists is available online and is part of a Mix & Match Minis sale where customers can buy three and get one free.

articles.title: VERB Unveils Dynamic Rebrand to Usher In Its Next Era
articles.author: Verb
articles.summary: VERB, a brand experience agency, is launching a new brand identity and dynamic positioning to enhance its capabilities. The agency has partnered with CookUnity, a chef-crafted meal delivery service, with a new experience set to launch in February. VERB is also planning to debut its experience incubator and other proprietary initiatives.

articles.title: The Motorola Edge 2024 is down to only $300 in this Amazon sale
articles.author: Aaron Mamiit
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 2024 is available unlocked on Amazon for $300, a 45% discount from its original price of $550. The smartphone features a 6.6-inch OLED touchscreen, Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chip, 8GB of RAM, a 5,000 mAh battery, and a camera system including a 50MP main camera and a 32MP selfie camera.

articles.title: Nulogy releases new product to help manufacturing operations
articles.summary: Nulogy Corporation has launched Nulogy Smart Factory, a solution aimed at providing manufacturers with real-time visibility into their production operations. This new offering leverages machine monitoring and automated data capture to help manufacturers address issues, gain data-driven insights, and foster continuous improvement. Already, Smart Factory is reportedly being used to produce more than 2.6 billion products annually.

articles.title: D/CAL Partners With ScottsMiracle-Gro To Launch All-New Brand And Product Line
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ScottsMiracle-Gro is launching a new brand in February and has selected D/CAL as the lead strategic and creative agency. D/CAL's strategy, creative, production and social media expertise will support the launch, incorporating subculture-driven insights.

articles.title: The best window vacs for clearing condensation: seven expert picks for streak-free shine
articles.author: Andy Shaw
articles.summary: Kärcher, Tower, Amazon Basics, Beldray, and Screwfix have introduced or offer various window vacuum models, each with unique features. The Kärcher WV2 offers a balance between size and usability, while the Tower TWV10 stands out as a budget-friendly option. The Amazon Basics model boasts a long battery life. Beldray and Screwfix offer similar alternatives with slight variations in battery life and design.

articles.title: Marketing 6.0: The Evolution Of Immersive Experiences In Consumer Engagement
articles.author: S. Sabraz Nawaz
articles.summary: Starbucks enhances customer experience through multisensory marketing, and Amazon Go utilizes IoT-enabled stores. Brands leverage platforms like Roblox to engage younger audiences through metaverse gamified experiences. These examples highlight the application of Marketing 6.0 strategies by companies to improve customer experiences.

articles.title: 28 Travel Products If You're Determined To Only Pack A Carry-On
articles.summary: The article features a selection of new travel-related products available on Amazon, including the Kindle e-reader, packing cubes, travel jewelry pouches, portable chargers, universal travel adapters, foldable 3-in-1 chargers, travel pill cases, travel-sized bottles, phone stands, multi-tool pens, travel makeup brush combos, portable espresso makers, Bluetooth headphone adapters, weekend bags with charging ports, collapsible coffee cups, disposable mini toothbrushes, Hairbrellas, wallet multi-tools, makeup remover cloths, versatile travel shirts, solid sunscreens, money belts, and portable white noise machines. These products are designed to enhance convenience and organization for travelers.

articles.title: A virtual personal stylist
articles.summary: Acloset, an AI styling app, is used by the author to generate outfits from her digital wardrobe. The app uses factors like weather and occasion to suggest outfits. The author finds that using the app helps her to rediscover her sense of personal style and reduces the stress of choosing what to wear.

articles.title: New 'date night' dress from M&S is already in demand and 'it looks stunning on'
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer launched the Printed Round Neck Cape Sleeve Midaxi Tea Dress. The dress can be dressed down with trainers or sandals and a denim jacket or cardigan. It is suitable for summer.

articles.title: FlutterFlow Announces New Collaboration with Google Cloud and Accenture to Accelerate Product Innovation for the Consumer Packaged Goods Industry
articles.author: Flutter Flow Inc
articles.summary: FlutterFlow, in collaboration with Google Cloud and Accenture, launched the Product Innovation Accelerator under the Industry Value Network initiative. This solution leverages Generative AI to accelerate product development for the Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) industry. The initiative aims to enable CPG companies to bring new products to market faster by streamlining product lifecycle.

articles.title: DJI Flip Review: A Fabulous Follow Me Folding Drone
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: DJI launched the DJI Flip drone. The drone is a new entry-level model. Experts recommend the drone.

articles.title: City Fresh Market celebrates grand opening, bringing fresh food and community spirit to Ridgewood
articles.summary: City Fresh Market celebrated its grand opening in Ridgewood, offering fresh produce, quality groceries, and a neighborhood-friendly shopping experience. The store, located at 583 Grandview Ave., is the chain's 15th location across New York and New Jersey and its fifth Queens-based store, with commitment to community and sustainability.

articles.title: Dyson introduces stunning new red velvet and gold hair tools
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced a new special-edition red velvet and gold color option for its popular hair-styling products. This new design applies to Dyson's newer hair tools and is available with complimentary hair clips at checkout. The red and gold color scheme is intended as a Valentine's day gift as well as a nod to the Chinese New Year.

articles.title: 'We tested spring rolls from four supermarkets - one was so disappointing'
articles.author: Emilia Bona
articles.summary: Morrisons offers four vegetable spring rolls for £1.50, but testers found them flavorless. Asda's six vegetable spring rolls at £1.86 were criticized for their thick casing but praised for flavor. M&S sells six vegetable spring rolls for £3, receiving high praise for crispiness and flavor. Tesco's six vegetable spring rolls for £1.75 were deemed underwhelming.

articles.title: Is DeepSeek is available in India: How to download and what not to miss
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: DeepSeek AI, a Chinese AI startup, has gained popularity, surpassing ChatGPT in app store rankings. The DeepSeek mobile app is available for free on both Google Play Store and Apple App Store with open-source nature. However, due to "large-scale malicious attacks," the company has restricted new user sign-ups to mainland China only.

articles.title: Who needs the super to repaint the walls when you can color-match and paint yourself?
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Nix introduces the Nix Mini 3, a color-matching tool designed for DIY projects and creative endeavors. It scans surfaces and provides instant matches to over 200,000 paint colors via the Nix Toolkit app. The Nix Mini 3 is offered at a discounted price of $69.97 until February 9.

articles.title: Samsung QN90D Neo QLED review: Excels in every way
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the QN90D Neo QLED TV, a premium 4K TV, priced at Rs 151,990 for the 55-inch model, featuring Mini LED technology, quantum dots, and AI to enhance picture quality. It offers 144Hz refresh rates, VRR, and ALLM, and includes a Game Bar 4.0 with AI-powered genre detection making it an ideal television for gaming.

articles.title: Designli Introduces a Powerful Engine to Streamline App Development for Businesses
articles.summary: Designli has launched Designli Engine, a new Minimum Viable Product (MVP) development solution designed to fast-track app development. The Designli Engine automates the creation of approximately 80% of a product's backend and codebase, including main functionalities. Businesses can use Designli's methodology to accelerate their go-to-market strategy and allocate more budget to features that differentiate their digital product.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman breaks silence on biggest-ever threat to ChatGPT: We will ...
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: DeepSeek's new AI model, DeepSeek R1, has gained traction, challenging established AI players with its low-cost AI services. OpenAI acknowledges DeepSeek's competitive pricing and is prepared to meet the challenge by continuing to innovate and deliver advanced AI models.

articles.title: Designli Introduces a Powerful Engine to Streamline App Development for Businesses
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Designli launched Designli Engine, an MVP development solution designed to accelerate app development. The Engine automates approximately 80% of a product's backend and codebase and allows businesses to accelerate their go-to-market strategy. Businesses retain full intellectual property rights.

articles.title: The Best Body Washes For Dry Skin
articles.author: Odunmorayo Ayobami
articles.summary: Several companies offer body washes designed for dry skin. CeraVe Hydrating Body Wash contains ceramides and hyaluronic acid; Olay Ultra Moisture Body Wash includes shea butter. Naturium launched The Booster Hyaluronic Acid Body Wash with hyaluronic acid and glycerin. These products from CeraVe, Olay, and Naturium provide hydration and soothing properties for dry skin, targeting consumers seeking relief from dryness.

articles.title: Nothing teases new product: Phone 3a to be launched ahead of Phone 3?
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Nothing teases a new phone product, potentially the Phone 3a, ahead of the flagship Phone 3. The company posted a video on X showing only its signature LED lights. Speculations suggest the Phone 3a might launch before the Phone 3, with a possible announcement on March 4, 2025.

articles.title: SentryBay Recognized In Multiple Gartner® Hype Cycle™ Reports
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SentryBay has been recognized as a Sample Vendor in two Gartner Hype Cycle reports. This inclusion highlights SentryBay's endpoint protection technology. The technology delivers endpoint protection for enterprises using Microsoft Virtual Desktop and W365 environments.

articles.title: SentryBay Recognized In Multiple Gartner® Hype Cycle™ Reports
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SentryBay has been recognized for its Armored Client solution, designed to secure Microsoft AVD and W365 environments. The solution provides an impenetrable defensive layer that isolates and protects DaaS sessions and applications from keyloggers, screen capture, and malicious DLL injection, mitigating data leakage and credential theft risks without requiring prior threat identification.

articles.title: Jones Soda Secures Distribution in 2,000 C-stores in Key New Growth Initiative
articles.author: Jones Soda
articles.summary: Jones Soda Co. is launching three new product lines: Fiesta Jones, a Latin-inspired soda in 16 oz aluminum bottles; Pop Jones, a low-calorie functional soda in 12 oz slim cans; and Jones classic sodas in 12 oz glass bottles. These products will be available in nearly 2,000 C-stores starting in February and March 2025.

articles.title: SentryBay Recognized In Multiple Gartner® Hype Cycle™ Reports
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SentryBay has been recognized as a Sample Vendor in Gartner Hype Cycle reports for Endpoint and Workspace Security and Data Security. The company's Armored Client solution provides an impenetrable defensive layer that isolates and protects DaaS sessions and applications from keyloggers, screen capture, and malicious DLL injection. This solution aims to remove the risk of data leakage and credential theft in Microsoft AVD and W365 environments.

articles.title: I'm a beauty expert: could this new AI-powered platform select the perfect skincare products for me?
articles.author: Esther Coombes
articles.summary: L'Oréal Group-backed startup, Noli, launched a new beauty service that uses AI and user input to recommend personalized skincare and haircare routines. The service provides a free skin analysis, product recommendations from brands like SkinCeuticals and CeraVe, and discounts up to 30% on recommended routines.

articles.title: £25 off 'amazing' Olay anti-ageing cream that 'improves fine lines'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of Olay Retinol 24 MAX Night Cream Face Moisturiser to £18.99. The night cream contains Retinyl Propionate, antioxidant Vitamin E and Glycerin and is designed to renew skin overnight and improve the appearance of wrinkles. Alternative retinol creams mentioned include LOreal Paris Revitalift Laser Retinol Pressed Cream and No7 Pure Retinol Night Repair Cream.

articles.title: Slither into Savings with iShopChangi's Lunar New Year Bonanza in Singapore
articles.author: i Shop Changi
articles.summary: iShopChangi is launching Lunar New Year deals, providing promo codes for discounts up to 15% off. They offer free delivery for non-travelers in Singapore with a minimum spend of S$59. New iShopChangi shoppers can also use a promo code for S$20 off their first purchase with a minimum spend of S$79.

articles.title: Tuft & Needle's most popular mattress is on sale for less than $720
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Tuft & Needle is offering up to 20% off on their mattresses during the Presidents Day sale, which runs through February 25th. Customers can save up to $399 on hybrid queen size mattresses or purchase the Original Mattress in queen size for under $720. Tuft & Needle also offers a 100-night free trial and a hassle-free warranty.

articles.title: Infinix Smart 9 HD With 90Hz Display, 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Infinix launched the Smart 9 HD in India on Tuesday. The Smart 9 HD is the first smartphone in Infinix's new Smart 9 lineup. It is the successor to the Smart 8 HD.

articles.title: 30 Affordable Winter Essentials That Will Keep Your Home Cozy Without Breaking The Bank
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article features a curated list of products available for purchase on Amazon and Etsy, designed to enhance comfort and coziness during the winter months. These include items such as blackout curtains, milk frothers, shower steamers, hot water bottles, coloring books, and a range of home decor and personal care items.  It also features product from small business like Lulu Candles, Tsrarey, Ethereal Mountain, Eucalyptus Blooms, and Joy Jolt.

articles.title: 'Elegant yet practical' M&S dress that's now in the clearance sale with almost £30 off
articles.author: Branwen Jones
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is offering a discount on the White Stuff Jersey Printed Midi Shirt Dress, now priced at £37, reduced from its original price of £65. The dress, described as "elegant yet practical," is available online in limited sizes and has received positive reviews, with an average rating of 4.5 out of five stars.

articles.title: 25 Somewhat Mundane Things From Target That You Should Absolutely Have In Your Home
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Target is offering a variety of products to enhance organization and convenience. These include a mini portable humidifier, an electric wine bottle opener, cabinet bumpers, a tech accessory organizer, and a luggage scale, each designed to simplify daily life and address common inconveniences.

articles.title: Beauty buffs see wrinkles 'noticeably reduced' in two weeks using £9 serum reduced in better than Boots £10 Tuesday sale
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Nivea is promoting its anti-ageing serum, now available on Amazon with a 51% discount. The serum boasts a clinically proven formula with rapid glycostop and Q10, with user tests showing reduction in deep wrinkles and smoother skin in two weeks. The promotion highlights the product's features and benefits, including hydration and improved skin appearance.

articles.title: Ellie Goulding's Served launches ‘full-strength' RTD quartet
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Ellie Goulding's Served RTD has launched a new range of full-strength cocktails, including Lychee Martini, Strawberry Daiquiri, Espresso Martini and Cosmopolitan, targeting at-home drinkers. The 14.9% abv drinks will be available nationwide exclusively with Morrisons from next month.

articles.title: LG unveils futuristic tiny home van that resembles a 'business lounge' on wheels – here's what it has to offer
articles.author: Leo Collis
articles.summary: LG unveiled its "Lifestyle Solution for Mobility" prototype at CES 2025, showcasing its innovative MX platform. This prototype transforms a van into a customizable mobile space leveraging LG's appliance and AI Home technology, aiming to redefine mobility experiences.

articles.title: Customer Experience Transforms into a Revenue Powerhouse, Nextiva Survey Reveals
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nextiva, a UCXM platform provider, announced the results of its customer experience survey. The survey highlights that most businesses are embracing AI for CX, with revenue generation being a primary driver for AI investment, and that consolidating customer data into a single platform can improve CX. Nextiva's Unified-CXM transforms how businesses engage with their customers with orchestrated customer journeys that help businesses acquire, retain, and grow customers.

articles.title: Alex Smereczniak Is Disrupting the Franchise Industry with Franzy
articles.summary: Franzy, a platform designed to simplify the franchise buying process, has launched. The platform features the Franzy Fit Score, an AI-powered tool matching users with franchises based on their financial capacity, goals, and interests. It aims to democratize franchise ownership by providing a centralized hub for research, comparison, and funding.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra first impression: New Galaxy AI features, slimmer design, but same battery
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy S25 Ultra with design upgrades including reduced weight and curved edges. The smartphone features the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and new Galaxy AI features like Now Brief and AI Select. The device retains a 5000mAh battery, offering a promising battery life.

articles.title: I Tried Generative Dreams—Here's What My Soulmate's Sketch Revealed About Me
articles.summary: Generative Dreams is launching a spiritual sketch service that uses AI to create personalized digital artwork reflecting users' spiritual and cosmic identities, combining astrological data, tarot readings, and numerology. The service provides users with a digital sketch and insights into their spiritual journey, offering different pricing tiers and a money-back guarantee. Users can order the personalized sketch from the Generative Dreams website.

articles.title: DeepSeek sparks global AI selloff, with Nvidia losing around $593 billion
articles.author: Japan Times
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese startup, launched a free AI assistant. The company states that the new service uses less data and costs less than existing services.

articles.title: Beauty fans use free AI tool to build bespoke skincare regime with products 30% off
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Noli is offering customers a £20 discount on a £60 spend when they utilize its questionnaire-based service for tailored product recommendations. This promotion encourages users to engage with the company's recommendation service.

articles.title: Foxys Kitchen founders unveil premium kitchenware brand ‘Meh Baba'
articles.author: bugsbunny
articles.summary: Foxys Kitchen, known for their social media presence, has launched a new premium kitchenware brand called 'Meh Baba'. The initial product in the 'Meh Baba' collection is a premium stainless steel knife designed for home chefs and professionals, now available for purchase online. The company plans to release more high-quality kitchenware items throughout the year.

articles.title: Always-listening AI gadgets are here, but should you trust them?
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: NeoSapien launched the Neo 1, a pendant-styled AI device priced at ₹9,999 with a companion app subscription.  The device analyzes emotions and provides feedback on conversations. Batch 1 of Neo 1 has sold out, and pre-orders are open for Batch 2.

articles.title: Cerillion Achieves "Ready for ODA" Status with TM Forum
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cerillion has achieved "Ready for ODA" status from TM Forum for its CRM Plus and Enterprise Product Catalogue products. CRM Plus is an omni-channel CRM solution for customer experience management. Enterprise Product Catalogue is an AI-powered solution that simplifies product lifecycle management and accelerates time-to-market for new services.

articles.title: Lava Yuva Smart launched in India: Check out the price, specifications, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Yuva Smart in India, a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a 6.75-inch LCD, Unisoc 9863A chipset, 3GB RAM, 64GB storage, a 13MP primary camera, and a 5000mAh battery. Available in Glossy Lavender, Glossy Blue, and Glossy White, the phone is priced at Rs 6,000 and can be purchased on Flipkart, Amazon India, and other online shops.

articles.title: Forest Essentials vs Bath & Body Works: Which body wash for women gives smooth skin?
articles.author: Tanya Shree
articles.summary: Forest Essentials offers Indian Rose Absolute Shower Wash, a rich, aromatic cleanser with herbs and oils. Bath & Body Works Pure Wonder Shower Gel features a blend of iced rose, star jasmine, and warm white amber with Pro-Vitamins B5 and aloe. Forest Essentials is priced at ₹1425 for 200ml, while Bath & Body Works costs ₹1549 for 295ml.

articles.title: Beauty fans use free AI tool to build bespoke skincare regime with products 30% off
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Noli has launched a service utilizing AI technology to provide customers with tailored skincare routines. The service analyzes skincare needs and recommends products from brands like CeraVe, La Roche-Posay, Lancome, and Kiehls, often available at discounted prices. Customers can receive £20 off a £60 purchase by using the promotional code.

articles.title: Sky hands out huge tablet upgrade for Samsung fans
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Sky is offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 tablet for £3.50 per month under a new plan. Samsung describes the tablet as suitable for 'everyday entertainment and productivity in a portable package'.

articles.title: Audi RS Q8 Performance: Bookings open in India for the high-powered luxury SUV
articles.author: ETAuto Desk
articles.summary: Audi India has commenced bookings for the new Audi RS Q8 Performance, a high-performance SUV featuring a 4.0L V8 TFSI engine producing 640 hp and 850 Nm of torque. Customers can reserve the vehicle online through the Audi India website or the "myAudi connect" app with a booking amount of INR 5,00,000.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge has started a new race for ‘slim and slimmer' phones
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: Samsung is potentially launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a very thin phone with two back cameras and one front camera. Rumors suggest it will be priced lower than the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra. Apple is also rumored to be developing a very thin phone called the 'iPhone Air'.

articles.title: How Luxury Brands are Celebrating the Year of the Snake
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products and services to celebrate the Lunar Year of the Snake. Dyson introduced a special edition Red Velvet and Gold haircare range. TUMI presented a limited-edition capsule featuring a glided snake graphic. The North Face launched its 2025 Year of the Snake Collection, which includes jackets, hoodies, and accessories with a new Chinese snake pattern. Franck Muller debuted the Silhouette CX Snake timepiece, an Asia Pacific exclusive. Jil Sander released a limited capsule with key items such as the Snake Loafers. Hublot unveiled a special edition Big Bang watch. Hennessy introduced a new limited bottle of its X.O. Tiffany & Co. collaborated with Oscar Wang for limited-edition Year of the Snake gifts. Pandora released a series of playful charms and a snake bracelet. Davidoff of Geneva introduced a limited Year of the Snake cigar edition and gift set. VistaJet is offering a new Lunar New Year dining experience and a customized Lunar New Year Game Box.

articles.title: First UK drone delivery trials will be around Darlington
articles.author: Mike Hughes
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a drone delivery service where eligible customers with an Amazon account can receive orders via drone. Customers will receive a landing pad to place in their garden, and the drone will drop off the package from slightly above it. The battery-operated drones will lift off from Darlington and can fly out for more than 7.5 miles.

articles.title: Coke jumps on a nostalgic trend with new Coca-Cola Orange Cream flavor
articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is introducing a new flavor to its product lineup, one year after launching Coca-Cola Spiced.

articles.title: Elon Musk to challenge WhatsApp's dominance with 'XChat' messaging service
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) is speculated to launch 'XChat,' a messaging service to rival WhatsApp, potentially featuring message encryption. Elon Musk also teased 'XMail' in December 2024, an email service aiming to compete with Gmail by focusing on universal compatibility and removing outdated elements.

articles.title: 37 Products That Might Not Make You Superior, But Will Certainly Having You Feeling That Way
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: This article features a variety of recently launched or trending products available on Amazon, catering to diverse consumer needs. These include items like Good Molecules eye cream, Eos Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion, The Pink Stuff cleaner, Dr. Scholl's reviving foot masks, Essence Lash Princess Mascara, Anua's Heartleaf Cleanser, Mouthwatchers toothbrush, L'Oreal's 8 Second Wonder Water, Cup Cozy, COSRX's Snail Mucin Repairing Essence, Elizavecca's Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment, K-Cup cleaning pods, Dae Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream, Kahi's Wrinkle Bounce Multi Balm Facial Moisturizer, Tulip shade, walking pad and more.

articles.title: OmniBSIC Bank unveils new tagline
articles.summary: OmniBSIC Bank Ghana Limited has launched a new tagline, '…Not Just Another Bank,' to represent its mission of providing excellent and innovative banking services. The bank is also driving its strategic direction through the newly launched 'OmniBSIC 5.0' initiative, focusing on using data, AI, and machine learning to deliver predictive and personalized banking experiences, along with enhanced user convenience through digital banking solutions.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra attracts Brazilian consumers with reduced price and advanced features
articles.author: Redação
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring a 200 MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. Initially priced at R$ 12,999, Samsung adjusted the price to R$ 9,990 in Brazil, increasing its accessibility. The smartphone includes One UI 7, a titanium design, and competes with other premium devices.

articles.title: People Are Setting Up Tents 4 Days Before The Sales Begin to Grab The RTX 5090
articles.author: Arti Sergeev
articles.summary: NVIDIA is launching its new flagship GPUs, including the RTX 5090, RTX 5080, RTX 5070 Ti, and RTX 5070. People camped outside a Micro Center store in Tustin, California, four days before the January 30 sales to secure the new GeForce RTX 5090.

articles.title: 25 Things That'll Extend The Life Of Clothing And Accessories, Because You Hate Throwing Things Away
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Amodex is available for removing ink stains from fabrics, while a portable fabric shaver helps defuzz sweaters and coats. For leather items, a leather stain remover spray and Leather Honey conditioner can restore and protect. Other offerings include Foot Matters Shoe Stretch spray which can be used to stretch shoes for better fitting.

articles.title: 6 Kindle tips to up your e-reading game
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle includes several built-in features enhancing its adaptability.

articles.title: Slither into Savings with iShopChangi's Lunar New Year Bonanza in Singapore
articles.author: i Shop Changi
articles.summary: iShopChangi has launched deals on Lunar New Year essentials, offering discounts up to 60%. Customers can use promo codes for additional savings and newcomers get S$20 off their first purchase with a minimum spend of S$79. iShopChangi provides options for delivery and collection for travellers and non-travellers.

articles.title: 56 Sex Toys That Make Perfect Valentine's Day Gifts
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new sex toys for Valentine's Day, with diverse features and technologies. Some of the companies are MysteryVibe, Lovability, Emojibator, Unbound, Ride The Cowgirl, Dame, Vush, We-Vibe, Lelo, B-Vibe and Fleshlight. The new products include everything from vibrators to dildos to cock rings, offering various options for couples and solo exploration, including features like app control, custom vibration patterns, and unique designs.

articles.title: Coke-New Flavor
articles.author: 이현우 오늘의 Mlb
articles.summary: Coca-Cola introduced Coca-Cola Orange Cream. AP provided access to a third-party photo illustrating news reporting on the product.

articles.title: Who's ready for some Coca-Cola Orange Cream?
articles.author: Review Journal
articles.summary: Coca-Cola experiments with new flavors. These experiments aim to maintain customer engagement with the brand's core product.

articles.title: LS Digital launches AI marketing stack with aim to accelerate adoption
articles.author: Gaurav Laghate
articles.summary: LS Digital has launched its AI marketing stack, integrating artificial intelligence into its suite of marketing services. This AI marketing stack combines real-time research capabilities, generative AI tools for campaign creation, and predictive analytics for trend forecasting. LS Digital is offering limited free access to the new marketing stack Research AI for existing clients to accelerate AI adoption.

articles.title: When will Amazon drone deliveries come to the UK?
articles.author: James Hockaday
articles.summary: Amazon is planning to launch its Prime Air drone delivery service in the UK, with a proposed warehouse in Darlington. The company is seeking necessary approvals from local authorities and regulators for the service, which aims to deliver packages up to 2.25kg in under half an hour. Amazon plans to deliver 500 million packages by the end of the decade.

articles.title: What is DeepSeek and why is it disrupting the AI sector?
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese startup, has launched new AI models. DeepSeek claims these models are comparable to or superior than leading US models but are available at a lower cost. This launch is seen as a potential disruption to the technology landscape.

articles.title: DJI Flip Review: A Fabulous Follow Me Folding Drone
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: DJI's new entry-level drone, the DJI Flip, is recommended as the best on the market.

articles.title: Coca-Cola unveils new flavor
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A new flavor is now available in original and zero-sugar options.

articles.title: GoDaddy: Boost Your Business at the New Year with Digital Tools to Help Drive E-Commerce ...
articles.author: APO
articles.summary: GoDaddy is offering a suite of AI-powered tools to help small businesses improve their online presence and drive sales growth.

articles.title: ALL-NEW NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 50 SERIES GRAPHICS CARDS TO BE AVAILABLE VIA THE EE ONLINE GAME STORE (EE Limited)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: EE announced it will stock NVIDIA's all-new GeForce RTX 50 Series graphics cards. The new NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series graphics cards will be available via the EE online game store.

articles.title: Dyson launched a new Airwrap, Airstrait, and Supersonic Nural hair dryer, and they're Valentine's Day gold
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Dyson has released its Airwrap, Airstrait, and Supersonic Nural hair styling tools in a new color.

articles.title: The best Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra screen protectors
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Samsung launched its new flagship phone, the Galaxy S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Free car washes offered as Tommy's Express set to open in Grand Blanc Township
articles.author: Michigan Live
articles.summary: Tommy's Express Car Wash is opening its first location in Grand Blanc Township, offering a new car wash service. The company aims to provide the best car wash experience and positively impact the local community.

articles.title: UNLEASHED BRANDS ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF WATER WINGS SWIM SCHOOL
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Unleashed Brands is expanding its Youth Enrichment Platform into the swim category. They acquired Water Wings, representing an expansion of family-focused offerings supporting child development across all ages.

articles.title: Audi Opens Bookings For New RS Q8 Performance
articles.author: Zeenews
articles.summary: Audi has initiated bookings for its new Audi RS Q8 Performance model in India, marking the product's launch in the Indian market.

articles.title: DeepSeek R1: This Is What's Driving The Hype Around China's New AI System
articles.author: IFL Science
articles.summary: DeepSeek launched a new AI model called R1. R1 positions DeepSeek as a competitor to OpenAI, Google, and Meta. R1's results may shape how future chatbots are developed.

articles.title: Loomos AI Glasses Is Now Available on Kickstarter: All-Day Battery, 16MP Camera, and GPT-4o Integrated
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Loomos, a sub-brand of SHARGE, is launching the Loomos AI Glasses. The launch is officially happening.

articles.title: Jetify launches Testpilot, its AI QA engineer
articles.author: Crunch
articles.summary: Jetify is launching its first AI agent product named Testpilot. Testpilot is the company's initial AI offering.

articles.title: Leaseweb Boosts AI-Focused Infrastructure Portfolio With Launch Of New NVIDIA GPU Solutions
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: LeaseWeb launched a new NVIDIA GPU solution. The solution aims to help customers improve their operations, reduce costs and enhance computational speed for demanding workloads.
